abstract: From The Conscience of a Liberal: JPMorgan Chase’s Jamie Dimon was castigated by many people, Paul Krugman included, for saying that a financial crisis is “the type of thing that happens every five, ten, seven, years.” But that is the way banking worked once upon a time.
